snippet: Amir Hekmati, an American incarcerated in Iran since August 2011, recently wrote to its foreign minister seeking help in gaining his release.
abstract: Family members of Amir Hekmati, American incarcerated in Iran since August 2011, report that he wrote to country's foreign minister seeking help in gaining his release; request came after Hekmati learned that he had been secretly tried and sentenced to 10 years imprisonment on charge of collaborating with American government.
lead_paragraph: Amir Hekmati, an American incarcerated in Iran since August 2011, recently wrote to its foreign minister seeking help in gaining his release.

headline.main: Ex-Marine Held in Iran Asks Official for Help
headline.print_headline: Ex-Marine Held in Iran Asks Official for Help
